INSERT INTO faq_medicalrec_ca ( name,
id_par,
creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify ) VALUES ( #{name},
#{idPar},
#{creator}, now(), #{operator}, now() )

INSERT INTO faq_medicalrec ( name, id_demo,
id_medicalrec_ca,
id_org, sd_level, sd_use, creator, gmt_create, operator, gmt_modify ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{idDemo},
#{idMedicalrecCa},
#{idOrg}, #{sdLevel}, #{sdUse}, #{creator}, now(), #{operator}, now() )
INSERT INTO faq_med_tag(id_med_tag ,id_medicalrec, id_tag, id_med_case) VALUES (#{idMedTag}, #{idMedicalrec}, #{idTag}, #{idMedCase}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id_med_case = #{idMedCase}
INSERT INTO faq_eva_tag(id_eva_tag ,id_medicalrec, id_tag, id_eva_case) VALUES (#{idEvaTag}, #{idMedicalrec}, #{idTag}, #{idEvaCase}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id_eva_case = #{idEvaCase}
mapper.select: SELECT id_medicalrec_ca AS id , id_par AS pId , name, 1 as open, id_org as ext FROM faq_medicalrec_ca WHERE fg_valid = '0'

SELECT bmt.id_tag , bmt.name , bmt.cd_med_asse , bm.path , bma.script, d.id_med_tag, d.id_med_case, e.name as caseName FROM bas_medical_tag bmt LEFT JOIN bas_media bm ON bmt.id_media = bm.id_media LEFT JOIN bas_med_asse bma ON bmt.cd_med_asse = bma.cd_med_asse left join faq_med_tag d on d.id_tag = bmt.id_tag and d.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} left join faq_med_case e on d.id_med_case = e.id_med_case WHERE bmt.fg_valid = '0' AND bmt.fg_active = '1' AND bmt.fg_show_make = '1' AND bmt.id_demo = #{idDemo} ORDER BY bmt.sort

SELECT bet.id_tag , bet.name , bet.cd_eva_asse , bm.path , bea.script, d.id_eva_tag, d.id_eva_case, e.name as caseName FROM bas_eva_tag bet LEFT JOIN bas_media bm ON bet.id_media = bm.id_media LEFT JOIN bas_eva_asse bea ON bea.cd_eva_asse = bet.cd_eva_asse left join faq_eva_tag d on d.id_tag = bet.id_tag and d.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} left join faq_eva_case e on d.id_eva_case = e.id_eva_case WHERE bet.fg_valid = '0' AND bet.fg_active = '1' AND bet.fg_show_make = '1' AND bet.id_demo = #{idDemo} ORDER BY bet.sort

SELECT fm.id_medicalrec, fm.name, fm.id_demo, fm.id_medicalrec_ca, fm.id_org, fm.sd_level, fm.sd_use, fm.count, fm.fg_active, fm.fg_valid, fm.creator, fm.gmt_create, fm.operator, fm.gmt_modify FROM faq_medicalrec fm where fm.id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec}
select id_med_tag,id_med_case from faq_med_tag where id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} and id_tag = #{idTag}
select id_eva_tag,id_eva_case from faq_eva_tag where id_medicalrec = #{idMedicalrec} and id_tag = #{idTag}
